reviewText: I bought this Blu Ray because I always been a fan of him since the times of the Me Amaras album. This concert was at the Coliseo de Puerto Rico and I was suprised how they capture the place. Now about the production, well I was surprised also about how clear the image is. You feel almost that you are there.Well about the concert, he covers songs from his beginnings like Fuego de Noche y Nieve de Dia (amazing song), Revolucion, Somos La Semilla, Maria, Gracias por Pensar en Mi(Beautiful song), Lola Lola, La Bomba and Vuelve. The production is amazing with dancers all the place and many effects. I recommend this Blu Ray to fans and people who don't know how talented this guy is.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I don't speak Spanish and Spanish is not required to enjoy this concert. Let's get to the highlights:1. Ricky Martin is SOOOOOOHHHH good looking;2. Did I mention how good looking Ricky Martin is? Gorgeous face, beautiful skin (and blue-ray & high def shows all the flaws), hot powerful body, nice smile, eyes, ooh la la!3. His voice is soulful, powerful - Ricky has talent;4. Ricky has a cool dancing style, it's different, and he got some moves;5. The choreography was pretty good. The backup dancers were fierce and the backup singers and band was just as fierce. I lovediddid (pronounced love-did-did) the Egyptian dance routine;6. Getting this on Blu-ray was the right choice. It sounds great and the picture is amazing.Okay, so what I wrote that he's good looking several times, but I mean, how many men, whatever his sexual orientation, can rock a tribal wrap skirt over pants during one set and a wood beaded necklace in another and still look masculine and sexy? This is a great concert. I surely will invest in seeing Ricky next time he tours the States. Some songs are in English, some are in Spanish and some are a combination of both. I'm really glad that I purchased this blu-ray concert. It is well worth the inexpensive price and I enjoy watching Ricky, the musicians and the dancers groove throughout this entire concert.
summary: IT'S PARTY TIME! BUY THIS NOW - AND ON BLU-RAY!

reviewText: Ricky Martin can entertain. This Blu-ray is fantastic. The video and PQ is flawless and of course it was all shot in Hi Definition. I highly recommend this Blu-ray. You'll enjoy watching the concert.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I'd patiently waited for the blu-ray release not buying the dvd. Finally, my long wait is over! This blu-ray provides a fest to my eyes and ears. PQ is not at top notch but still great. You will enjoy all the details of Ricky martin and the concert. The audio is excellent with its uncompressed PCM 5.1 & 2.0. Ricky is such an entertainer and performer. I thought the older he is the better performer he becomes. He is a better dancer for sure than ever before. For about 100 minutes, he sang many different songs from ballad to up tempo dance numbers and rock in both English and Spanish. It's interesting he re-arranged and sang some of his big hits in new style including "Livin' La Vida Loca" and "Maria" The stage was creative, the production outstanding and the atmosphere great. It's good to see such happy audience singing along. There is a couple of drawbacks though.Firstly, no English subtitles provided. Ricky speaks in Spanish many times but no clues what he's taking about. In a couple of songs, he dances in a too sensual way you don't want to show your kids. All in all, the concert was really enjoyable and this blu-ray will give you the best experience at your very room.
Title: N/A
